SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Upon a successful creation of an Instance, the API will return the InstanceID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: ID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Type ID of the activity you want to Create - For now: the API can only create Workshop Instances (accredited [a linked class will be created] / non-accredited).

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity type of the activity. w = workshop, p = accredited program, el = e-learning.

PARAMETERS.NAME: name
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity name for POST(create)

PARAMETERS.NAME: ProgramName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity name for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: startDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Start Date for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: PStartDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Start Date for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: finishDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Finish Date for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: PFinishDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Finish Date for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: startTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Start Time for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: PStartTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Start Time for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: finishTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Finish Time for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: PFinishTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity Finish Time for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainerContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity trainer for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: ConsultantID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity trainer for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: location
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity location.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity owner.Optional for PUT(update)

PARAMETERS.NAME: cost
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Cost Per Participant / Student.

PARAMETERS.NAME: domainID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The activity domain ID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: comments
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Any Comments for the Activity Instance.

PARAMETERS.NAME: public
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Public or Private - For type 'w' it is the coordination type: In-House (0) or Public Workshop (1)for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: ptype
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: For type 'w' it is the coordination type. Valid types are: 'In-House', 'Public Workshop', 'Timetabled Unit' for PUT(update).

PARAMETERS.NAME: dateDescriptor
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to type 'w' - The Date Descriptor - i.e Between 2-5 PM on Thursday the 20/11/2014.

PARAMETERS.NAME: syncDateDescriptor
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to type 'w' - Date Descriptor field will be automatically set based on workshop start and finish dates

PARAMETERS.NAME: minParticipants
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to type 'w' - The Minimum Participants.

PARAMETERS.NAME: maxParticipants
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to type 'w' - The Maxium Participants.

PARAMETERS.NAME: estimatedParticipants
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to type 'w' - The Estimated Participants expected to enrol.

PARAMETERS.NAME: duration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to Workshops - The Duration numerical value for POST(create).

PARAMETERS.NAME: PDuration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to Workshops - The Duration numerical value for PUT(update).

PARAMETERS.NAME: durationType
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Specific to Workshops - The Duration Type i.e: hour, hours, day, days, half-day, session, sessions.

PARAMETERS.NAME: CloseDays
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Close Days. If provided without CloseMinutes parameter - Closes will be calculated 'at midnight'

PARAMETERS.NAME: CloseMinutes
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Close Minutes. If provided - Closes will be calculated 'befor start time'

PARAMETERS.NAME: FacilitatorFee
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Facilitator Fee

PARAMETERS.NAME: FacilitatorInvRec
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Facilitator InvRec

PARAMETERS.NAME: FWBRate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: FWB Rate

PARAMETERS.NAME: Inclusions
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Inclusions

PARAMETERS.NAME: Travel
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Travel

PARAMETERS.NAME: Accom
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Accomodation

PARAMETERS.NAME: JobCardId
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Job Card Id

PARAMETERS.NAME: GST_type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: GST type; 0- no GST, 1- GST included, 2 - GST excluded

PARAMETERS.NAME: finCodeID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Valid finCodeID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: customField_[variableName]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Replace [variableName] with the actual customField variable name to set a customField value against the enrolment (if enabled and set up). If updating a custom field that supports multiple values, you can use comma-delimited values or a JSON array. If using comma-delimited, it is expected the data is URL encoded first. For example, to get 2 values: 'A,B' and 'C' you would either pass: "['A,B','C']" or "A%2CB,C"

PARAMETERS.NAME: Status
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Status of the Workshop. The available choices are as follows: Active, Cancelled, Completed, Incomplete, Tentative

DESCRIPTION: Creates an activity instance. (POST)or Updates existing activity instance(PUT)
